title: Saint Paul and Sergius, Roman Proconsul in Cyprus
description: Saint Paul and Sergius, Roman Proconsul in Cyprus; Malnazar (Armenian, active about 1630s), and Aghap'ir (Armenian, active about 1630s); Isfahan, Persia; 1637 - 1638; Tempera colors, gold paint, and gold leaf on parchment; Leaf: 25.2 x 18.3 cm (9 15/16 x 7 3/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig I 14, fol. 582v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
